tpeg_message.summary: M5 Devon - Long delays on M5 northbound at J29, A3015 (Exeter), because of an earlier accident. Congestion to before J30 (Exeter / Service Areas). All lanes have been re-opened.
M1 South Yorkshire - One lane closed on M1 southbound from J33, A630 (Catcliffe) to J32, M18 (M18 interchange), because of roadworks.
M180 Lincolnshire - One lane closed on M180 westbound from J3, M181 (Scunthorpe) to J2, A161 (Gainsborough), because of emergency Bridge repairs.
M4 Bristol - Narrow lanes and one lane closed on M4 in both directions in Gloucestershire from J19, M32 (Bristol) to J20, M5 J15 (Almondsbury Interchange), because of roadworks. Expect delays.
M4 Bridgend - One lane closed on M4 eastbound from J37, A4229 (Pyle) to J36, A4061 (Bridgend), because of roadworks.
M2 Kent - M2 exit slip road closed London-bound at J5, A249 (Sittingbourne), because of major roadworks.
M2 Kent - Speed restriction of 50 mph and one lane closed on M2 in both directions between J6, A251 (Faversham) and J5, A249 (Sittingbourne), because of roadworks.
M1 Derbyshire - One lane closed and a speed restriction of 50 mph on M1 in both directions between J30, A616 (Worksop) and J31, A57 (Sheffield), because of roadworks.
M8 Glasgow City - Two lanes closed on M8 in both directions between J15, Townhead and J17, Great Western Road, because of long-term roadworks.
M27 Hampshire - One lane closed on M27 in both directions at J8, A3024 (Bursledon), because of long-term roadworks.
M67 Greater Manchester - M67 entry slip road closed eastbound at J2, A57 (Denton), because of long-term roadworks.
M1 Bedfordshire - One lane closed on M1 northbound after J12, A5120 (Flitwick), because of roadworks.
M1 West Yorkshire - Lane closed and a speed restriction of 50 mph on M1 in both directions between A1(M) J43 and J45, A63 (Leeds Cross Green), because of roadworks.
M18 South Yorkshire - Queues and one lane closed on M18 southbound from J2 A1(M) J35 to J1, A631 (Bramley), because of vehicle fire.
M1 Northamptonshire - One lane closed on M1 northbound between J16, A45 (Daventry) and J17, M45 (Dunchurch), because of a vehicle having a tyre changed. Traffic is coping well.
M4 Berkshire - M4 lane closed on exit slip road eastbound at J13, A34 (Chieveley), because of emergency drainage repairs. Traffic is coping well.
M62 Cheshire - One lane closed and it's slow on M62 eastbound from M62 J10, Croft Interchange to J11, A574 (Birchwood), because of a breakdown.
M5 Worcestershire - Two lanes closed and queues on M5 southbound from J4a M42 to J5, A38 (Droitwich), because of a lorry that's broken down. Travel time is around 25 minutes.
M4 Berkshire - Queues and one lane closed on M4 eastbound between J10 A329(M) Wokingham and J8/9, A404 (Maidenhead), because of a spillage.
M1 South Yorkshire - One lane closed on M1 in both directions between J35, A629 (Rotherham) and J34, A631 (Meadowhall), because of roadworks.
M25 London - M25 lane closed on entry slip road anticlockwise at J28, A12 (Brentwood), because of long-term roadworks. Expect delays.
M25 Surrey - Narrow lanes on M25 in both directions around J10, A3 (Wisley Interchange), because of long-term roadworks. Expect delays.
M4 Berkshire - Speed restriction of 50 mph on M4 in both directions between J13, A34 (Chieveley) and J14, A338 (Hungerford), because of a contraflow and roadworks.
M27 Hampshire - Lane closed on M27 in both directions from J12, M275 (Portsmouth) to J11, A27 (Fareham), because of drainage works.
M2 Kent - Heavier than normal along the exit slip road on M2 London-bound at J3, Chatham.
M25 Kent - M25 busy but moving anticlockwise at the Dartford Tunnels. Travel time is ten minutes.
M2 Kent - M2 entry slip road closed and one lane closed coastbound at J2, A228 (Strood), because of emergency repairs.
M6 Cheshire - Narrow lanes and a speed restriction of 50 mph on M6 in both directions from J21a, M62 J10 (Croft Interchange) to J26, M58 (Orrell Interchange), because of long-term roadworks.
M621 West Yorkshire - Narrow lanes and a speed restriction of 50 mph on M621 in both directions between J1, A6110 (Beeston) and J2, A643 (Elland Road), because of long-term roadworks.
M1 Bedfordshire - It's heavy on M1 southbound around J11, A505 (Dunstable). Travel time is five minutes.
M40 Oxfordshire - The usual congestion on M40 southbound before J9, A34 (Bicester). Travel time is five minutes.
